channel.title: Edge4pk
channel.description:
I tried to open up edge4pk and log in but i get this sorry, loading char error. The owner said to change the java path but all i got for my source is this
@echo off title Activated Edge4Pk java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.6.0_31-ga-bin.jar server exit
and for my client i got
@echo off title Edge4Pk
:start echo. echo ------------------------------------------------ echo Edge4Pk (x64), Starting up... echo ------------------------------------------------ if exist "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/" goto x64 goto x86
:x64 title Edge4Pk (x64) - Loader echo Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo. "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client
:x86 title Edge4Pk (x86) - Loader echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo.
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client exit

item.title: Edge4pk
item.dc:creator: @ichigohatake ichigohatake
item.description:
@ichigohatake wrote:

It worked! Thanks man!

Read full topic

item.title: Edge4pk
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

you did it wrong. You need the % sighs, so the system knows its a variable. Its this:

@echo offtitle 
Activated Edge4Pk
set/a "java=C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_31/bin/Javac.exe"
%java% -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

EDIT: Sorry there was some formatting error

Read full topic

item.title: Edge4pk
item.dc:creator: @ichigohatake ichigohatake
item.description:
@ichigohatake wrote:

i get “divided by zero error” and i typed

@echo off
title Activated Edge4Pk
set/a “java=C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_31/bin/Javac.exe”
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Edge4pk
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

try this:

@echo off title Activated Edge4Pk set/a "java=C:/JAVA-PATH-HERE" %java% -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.6.0_31-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Edge4pk
item.dc:creator: @ichigohatake ichigohatake
item.description:
@ichigohatake wrote:

I tried to open up edge4pk and log in but i get this sorry, loading char error. The owner said to change the java path but all i got for my source is this

@echo off
title Activated Edge4Pk
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.6.0_31-ga-bin.jar server
exit

and for my client i got

@echo off
title Edge4Pk

:start
echo.
echo ------------------------------------------------
echo Edge4Pk (x64), Starting up…
echo ------------------------------------------------
if exist “%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/” goto x64
goto x86

:x64
title Edge4Pk (x64) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.
“%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client

:x86
title Edge4Pk (x86) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.

“%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client
exit
